| History                 = The PX is a special unit of the [[New York City Police Department (Earth-616)|NYPD]] equipped to deal with enhanced humans of various types.

When the newly-elected [[Wilson Fisk (Earth-616)|Major Wilson Fisk]] provoked [[Matthew Murdock (Earth-616)|Daredevil]] into attacking his office, he had the NYPD deploy PX units to subdue him. They eventually failed when [[Samuel Chung (Earth-616)|Blindspot]] assisted Daredevil, impersonating him and using his invisibility powers on plain sight, so as to make it seem as if he had teleported away.{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 596}}
